title: Pool, Wheelchair Access, Baseboard Heating, Tech Ready
map_address: 11153 Shipside Ln Nw near Ridgetop and Shipside
posting_body: ['$500 off August rent when you look and lease today!', 'Welcome to Ridgetop Apartment Homes!', 'Ridgetop Apartments offer newly renovated 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments with washer/dryers, fireplaces and modern conveniences in Silverdale, WA, less than 2 miles from Highway 3 and Highway 303.', 'We are also in close proximity to The Trails at Silverdale and the Kitsap Mall.', 'Enjoy our spectacular views of the Olympic Mountains and on-site 24/7 fitness centers, pool and spa, and professional management.', "Plus, we're within 8 miles of Bremerton, Bangor, Harrison Medical Center and Puget Sound Naval Shipyard so you can easily commute to work.", 'The Bremerton Ferry Terminal and high-speed ferry are just a short drive away!', 'Call now to arrange a virtual tour of Ridgetop!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 30', 'OR Text', '30', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text with us.', 'Use this link for more information:', '<URL>', 'This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1097 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Private Patio/Balcony', '- Baseboard Heating', '- Garbage Disposal', '- Wheelchair Access', '- Washer & Dryer', '- Ceiling Fan', '- Wood Burning Fireplace', '- Dishwasher', '- Vaulted Ceilings*', '- Additional Storage', '- Oversized Closets', '- Tech Ready', '- Olympic Mountain Views*', '- Carport with Every Home', 'Community Amenities', '- Dog Park and Walking Paths', '- Accepts Electronic Payments', '- Spa/Hot Tub', '- Monthly Resident Events', '- Rental Furniture Available From CORT', '- Pool', '- 24 Hour Fitness Center', '- On-Site Maintenance', '- High-speed/Wi-Fi', '- Covered Parking', '- Walking Distance to Clear Creek Trail', '- Package Concierge', '- TV Lounge', '- Close to PSNS and Naval Base Kitsap', '- On-Site Management', '- Newly Renovated Clubhouse', '- Located in a Residential Neighborhood', '- Business Center', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats and Dogs are allowed.', 'We do allow pets in our apartment communities.', 'Our policy is as follows: *1.', 'Only 3 pets are permitted in each apartment.', '*2.', 'It is our policy to accept only dogs, cats, birds and fish.', 'Acceptance of dogs is based on breed.', '*3.', "Breed restrictions are as follows: Pit Bull/Staffordshire Terriers, Rottweilers, Dobermans, Saint Bernards's, Great Danes, German Shepherds, Chows, Presa Canarios, Akitas, Alaskan Malamutes, Wolf-hybrids, full blood or mixed at a percentage are prohibited from residing at our Community.", '*4.', 'A Pet Agreement and Fee will be required for the first pet and an additional non-refundable fee may apply for additional pets.', '*5.', 'Service animals may accompany a resident with a verifiable disability for the purpose of aiding that person are not considered pets.',
